data.title: Show Me The Father
data.meta_description: Four men, one calling: To serve and protect. When tragedy strikes home, these men are left wrestling with their hopes, their fears, their faith, and their fathering. Protecting the streets is second nature. Raising their children in a God-honoring way? That's courageous.
data.text:
Everyone has a unique father story. Whether positive or painful, it’s always personal and can deeply affect the core of our identity and direction of our lives. Kendrick Brothers’ SHOW ME THE FATHER is the first documentary film from the creators of WAR ROOM, OVERCOMER, FIREPROOF, and COURAGEOUS Legacy. Featuring a variety of amazing true stories, this captivating movie takes audiences of all ages on an inspiring and emotional cinematic journey.

Watch The Trailer

KENDRICK BROTHERS’ SHOW ME THE FATHER (2021)

Available on Digital, Blu-ray™ and DVD

With showtime purchases and large-group gatherings, churches, ministries, businesses, and schools maximized the impact of SHOW ME THE FATHER when it played in theaters. Now these groups and others can make the most of the film by hosting SHOW ME THE FATHER Movie Events.

Order your official Site License from Provident Films and AFFIRM Films today and host your KENDRICK BROTHERS’ SHOW ME THE FATHER Movie Event this weekend!

Click Here For Church License Click Here For Other License Click Here For Theater License

Theater License

If you are inquiring about licensing and/or showing SHOW ME THE FATHER in a THEATER please email David_Jennings@spe.sony.com and Benjamin_Scantlin@spe.sony.com. We will be in touch with you within 1-2 business days. Thank you.

Why a Site License?

Since DVDs are only licensed for home or personal viewing, a site license is required to show movies to your church, school, ministry, or organization. In order to host group showings of SHOW ME THE FATHER, you will need to purchase an official Site License. Please note: site licenses are not available for in-theater showings and umbrella license programs (such as CVLI) do not apply to films like this.

RESOURCES

Discussion Guide

A Father's Blessing

Have you ever thought that blessings seem outdated? While blessings contain roots in ancient history, they still serve a very purposeful role in our world and even in your life. In biblical times, there was nothing more monumental than receiving a blessing from your father, so it’s worth taking a closer look at the Blessing. This resource is designed to help us all understand the power of a Blessing and how it can radically transform us. Whether you have or have not received or given a blessing before, there’s something here for you. When used together, the movie and this Discussion Guide can help you personally experience the power of a Blessing.

Download Guide (PDF)

Discussion Guide

Fathers play an oversized role in our lives. In fact, it’s impossible to truly understand the meaning of life and the truth of Christianity without understanding that the center of the whole story of reality is one of eternal love and glory between a Father and His only Son Jesus Christ. That’s why it’s no coincidence that each one of us has a story regarding our father, and it is often one of great joy or unfortunate pain. This resource will guide you through the various themes, elements, and important topics from the film. These questions will prompt personal reflection and discussion with your family and friends and provide application to help you better understand your own father story and see God as your perfect Father.

Download Guide (PDF)
